blogPost.title: Why is speech recognition an important tool for kids? Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: なぜ音声認識は子供にとって重要なツールなのでしょうか？Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd
为什么语音识别是儿童的重要工具？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 创始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd
爲什麼語音識別是兒童的重要工具？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 創始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/7Juqa1Ch2I https://t.co/QfwWU0AJBd

previous.title: Can you share a surprising fact you found working with DoorDash data? Answer by Raghav Ramesh, Machine Learning Engineer @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl

localize.full_text: あなたがDoorDashのデータを使って見つけた驚くべき事実を教えてください。Answer by Raghav Ramesh, Machine Learning Engineer @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl
您能分享一下您在使用DoorDash数据时发现的一个令人惊讶的事实吗？回答者：Raghav Ramesh, 机器学习工程师 @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl
您能分享一下您在使用DoorDash數據時發現的一個令人驚訝的事實嗎？回答者：Raghav Ramesh, 機器學習工程師 @DoorDash. https://t.co/F5yan2Bw1V https://t.co/7fVFrfqzgl

next.title: How can parents help their children not fall behind in school? Answer by @KathrynStarke, Literacy Consultant, Author, Founder of The Starke School. https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f

localize.full_text: 子供が学校で遅れを取らないようにするには、親はどうすればいいですか？Answer by @KathrynStarke, Literacy Consultant, Author, Founder of The Starke School. https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
父母如何帮助他们的孩子不在学校里落后？回答者：@KathrynStarke，识字顾问、作家、Starke学校的创始人。https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
父母如何幫助他們的孩子不在學校裏落後？回答者：@KathrynStarke，識字顧問、作家、Starke學校的創始人。https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
